DataElement.preferredName: Patient Experience Sickness Require Extra Visits To Clinic Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single character text field to indicate if the patient experienced sickness/required extra visits to the clinic.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Experience Sickness Require Extra Visits To Clinic
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities._A state of ill health, bodily malfunction, or discomfort._Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory._Exceeding the normal or usual number._The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._A health care facility where patients are admitted to get treatment provided by a group of physicians practicing medicine together.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Sickness Requirement Supernumerary Visit To Clinic Experience
Property.preferredDefinition: A state of ill health, bodily malfunction, or discomfort.:Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.:Exceeding the normal or usual number.:The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:A health care facility where patients are admitted to get treatment provided by a group of physicians practicing medicine together.:The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.

Concepts.definition: A state of ill health, bodily malfunction, or discomfort.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
Exceeding the normal or usual number.
The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
A health care facility where patients are admitted to get treatment provided by a group of physicians practicing medicine together.
The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a single character text field to record data.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
